About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Courteous and enthusiastic, I am interested in IT and everything in its orbit. I am a Full-stack Developer living in Auckland with Resident Visa. I have experience working on Microsoft Technologies and developing apps and building websites. I also have in-depth knowledge of SQL Server and NoSQL gained throughout my commercial experience.
As this IT Industry, I keen to gain more experience in this field. For this reason, I am looking for a company willing to offer me a placement among their developers. In return, I would offer my full commitment, and be a pleasant and friendly addition to your team.

Industry Connect

Software Developer Intern

At Industry Connect, I participated in an IT internship, during which I was a part of their software engineering departments. My daily activities included: Shadowing senior team members to get a feel for their day-to-day responsibilities. Taking on small software development projects then presenting my work to the leadership team. Assisting with process improvements, making suggestions on workflow changes where needed. Participating in weekly meetings and presentation with the entire internship team and seniors and .NET job-ready developer program and worked on multi-basic Projects like Create CRUD (ASP.NET Core MVC) applications and worked on designing and developing sides, solved bugs and help to team members. Designed and built web application tools using ASP.Net MVC, Bootstrap, Semantic UI, Javascript, JQuery, JSON, AJAX, Knockout, ADO.Net and SQL for the customer to optimize their playing technique. Participating in Product demos.

MVP Studio

Junior Full-Stack Developer

MVP Studio is a hire talented IT People and trained for the job. As a Software Developer, I work on their Property Management platform in an Agile environment. Participated in the entire development cycle includes gathered requirements for the creation of new tools, developed, tested and deployed the web application locally. Create CRUD (ASP.NET Core MVC) applications, Property Management System and worked on designing, SignUp, SignIn and developing sides, solved bugs and help to team members. Designed and built web application tools using ASP.Net MVC, Bootstrap, Semantic UI, Javascript, JQuery, JSON, AJAX, Knockout, ADO.Net and SQL for the customer to optimize their playing technique. Troubleshoot and resolve bugs in .Net MVC application to ensure optimal development environment. Carried out an optimization of the SQL Stored Procedures in MS SQL server to reduce batch queuing and processing time. Worked on Team Foundation Server(TFS) for project management with agile methodology.
